__e: Madam President, I don't mean to be impertinent, really, but... do you honestly think this is wise?
Look, I don't mean to seem ungrateful... but I would like to try this on my own for a while.
When we get through with you, Colonel Hogan, you will not be quite so insolent.
I'm so curious, I must risk being impertinent.
You must be either completely drunk or mad to dare to speak to a superior officer with such impertinentness!
I hope you do not find me impertinent. I have to do my part.
